titleStmt.title: Sir Lucius Cary, late Lord Viscount of Falkland, his discourse of infallibility, with an answer to it: and his Lordships reply. Never before published. Together with Mr. Walter Mountague's letter concerning the changing his religion. / Answered by my Lord of Falkland.
titleStmt.author: Falkland, Lucius Cary, Viscount, 1610?-1643.
Falkland, Lucius Cary, Viscount, 1610?-1643.
White, Thomas, 1593-1676.
Montagu, Walter, 1603?-1677.
Triplett, Thomas, 1602 or 3-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Gartrude Dawson, for Iohn Hardesty, and are to be sold at the signe of the Black Spread-Eagle, in Duck-Lane,

notesStmt.note: The "answer" to the discourse is by Thomas White (cf. BM; DNB).
Reproductions of the originals in the Cambridge University Library, and the British Library.
